summary: Aspiring college cheerleader, Cassie Stratford consumes an experimental drug that grants her beauty and enough athletic ability to make the cheer squad. The drug has an unforeseen side effect - Cassie starts to grow and grow and grow.
cast: Jena Sims|Sean Young|Treat Williams|Sasha Jackson|Olivia Alexander|Ryan Merriman|Ted Raimi|Anne McDaniels|Mary Woronov|Paula Trickey|A.J. Lamas|Jason Etter|Tony Evangelista|Nick Bauman|Jennifer Wenger|Paula Labaredas|Betsy Landin|Angelina Armani|Ariana Madix|Madison Dylan|Nancy Karr|Courtney Mache|Michelle Prenez|Summer Perry|Kristin Johnson|Rachel S. Carlson|Jennifer L. Hathern|Sean Christopher|Chris J. King|Joel Michael Kramer|Mario Perez|Mercy Malick|Dan Golden|Cole S. McKay|Sarah Snow|David Wald|Hiroo Minami|Tadahiro Nakamura|Brent Huff|John Landis|Roger Corman|Chad Randau|Annie Wood|Kristy Dowe|Alison Goser|Debra Haden|Ashley Morgan Kilbride|Eric Kolvek|Victor Phan|Amanda Philipson|Pete Sepenuk|J.J. Vazquez
title: Attack of the 50 Foot Cheerleader
